articles.author: STAN CHOE
articles.title: Wall Street falls following Trump’s tariffs, but not as badly as feared in the morning - The Associated Press
articles.description: President Donald Trump’s tariffs sent Wall Street on a roller coaster. The S&P 500 fell 0.8% Monday following sharper loses across Asia and Europe. The Dow Jones Industrial Average fell 0.3%, and the Nasdaq composite lost 1.2%. U.S. stocks had initially been …
articles.content: NEW YORK (AP) The threat of a punishing trade war sent Wall Street on a roller coaster Monday. After initially falling sharply on worries about President Donald Trumps tariffs, U.S. stocks pared thei… [+5740 chars]
